text:
@realDonaldTrump Is this your comment on the latest coronavirus fatality numbers, or is everybody just supposed to forget about 113,000 dead Americans?

In November the voters are gonna forget about you, Bunker Boy.

#TrumpHasNoPlan
#FakePresident https://t.co/RRRPB2u23M
